The rent for this community is 45 dollars per square meter.In this community, wankecheng stands as a testament to modern living in the heart of Beijing's peaceful suburbs. Constructed with the latest eco-friendly materials, this community prioritizes sustainability while ensuring comfort and luxury. The tall silver pine trees, from which the community gets its name, dot the skyline and provide refreshing shade during the summer months.
